features: 【This Set Includes Both The Broom and Dustpan】：Handheld dustpan: width: 11.8/30cm,height:7.8in/19.8cm;Brush:total length: 14.3in/36.5cm, brush length: 9.64in/24.5cm, wooden handle width: 0.98in/2.5cm, small design, easy to carry and store, indoor and outdoor are convenient to use.

【Light Weight & Premium】：Heavy duty metal dustpan made of high quality stainless steel, rust-proof, light weight and sturdy Without breaking or bending, beyond the plastic dustpan; the wooden handle of the brush is made of Millettia Laurentii wood, this wood has a beautiful grain, not easy to crack,and a solid wooden handle, durable and easy to grip.

【Optimum Pick-Up】：This metal dustpan features a unique, ribbed and extra-wide design to ensure maximum clean-up efficiency,The dust pan sports a thin-edge design to prevent those annoying lines of dirt from being left behind after a sweep-up,Precision edge for easier sweeping small items.

【Dense bristles】: The bristles of the broom are embedded in by handwork, not easy to fall out when cleaning, four rows of high quality bristles, encrypted and thickened, the amount of bristles is rich and has good elasticity, effectively laying grasp dirt, into small crevices, improve cleaning efficiency.

【Widely-Used】：Small Broom and Dustpan Set is light and small enough, so it's often used in windows, shoe cabinets, sofas, kitchens and office desktops, pet living environmentand even computer keyboards. Mini Dustpan and Brush is a good helper for local cleaning；Can also be used outdoors, for RVing and outdoor camping.

【Convenience suspension】：For added convenience, the heavy duty Metal Dustpann and brush are equipped with a built-in hanging slot to allow for efficient, space-saving storage and easy accessibility. Hang off the floor on any hanging hook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, non plastic and useful
reviews.reviewText: solid metal dustpan and natural bristle whisk broom. Great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this set. Made well, works well and looks nice by my wood stove. I added a leather strap to the broom handle because it already had a hole in the handle and I was able to hang it and the dustpan on my log rack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars way better than my plastic one!
reviews.reviewText: huge upgrade from my plastic dustpan! it doesn’t slide around when you’re sweeping up piles and dirt doesn’t stick to it. very durable and great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good but one complaint
reviews.reviewText: This thing is lovely to look at (I wanted one that was attractive enough to keep out, so I would sweep more) and so solid, works really well. I just wish the handle weren’t so wide. I have pretty large hands, but they can’t wrap fully around the handle, and I don’t love that. Not the most comfortable, and probably not as effective as if I could get a better grip. I would buy this again because it solved the main problem I had (ugly plastic dustpans that cracked easily which I therefore had to keep out of sight which then reduced how often I’d use them), but if you have small hands, maybe consider a similar model with a handle that will actually fit in your hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and does the job well!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely broom and pan set
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t have much plastic and the bristles are great! Lighter than I thought and precision tool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is to replace a cheap plastic one I had. I am not disappointed very sturdy, and it will last for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a very functional design
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking set- not super functional design. I could not sweep the little bits up because the edge of the pan is not flush with the floor so there were always crumbs left- I did return it for that reason. The pan handle is a little wide to hold comfortably as well. Maybe it would be better for large (not crumb-sized) debris.
This item seems to be well built and as advertised. Very quick delivery. Thank you.
I needed one that doesn’t break, this is sooooooo strong 👍
